oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Human resources lessons learned
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Scharping, Brandon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: culture
personality assessment
communication
teamwork
conflict
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Human resources may not be the most enjoyable topic for bovine veterinarians. However, human resource knowledge is important for building a cohesive team of veterinarians, veterinary techniÂ­cians and office staff members who can work together effectively. The goal of this presentation is to share some lessons learned as a new practice owner in our clinic that can hopefully be beneficial to other practice owners, as well as to future practice owners. People management is difficult, and it is even more difficult if there is no structure, mentorship or effective communication.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 57 (2024): 2024 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 102-104
